title: Tour Daily Podcast, second rest day: The mountain competition is hotting up
content:
Ronan, Caley, and Abby infiltrate Jimmy Whelan’s balcony to chat about the Mountains competition at the Tour de France and the upcoming stages.

Caley called up Sepp Kuss for some behind the scenes information on his stage 15 win.

Find the Equals CyclingTips x The Cyclists’ Alliance x Black Sheep kit here.

author: Abby Mickey
